health_data_information_systems_summary: Taskforce Report on Mombasa County Healthcare System
health_data_challenges: Lack of proper preventive strategies for lifestyle diseases such as cancer, diabetes, and hypertension
health_service_delivery_improvement_reco: 1. Establish a regular annual program for screening lifestyle and malignant diseases at affordable fees in all wards. 2. Establish a prevention and mitigation program against lifestyle and malignant diseases, including awareness campaigns and sensitization forums in all wards.
health_evidence_base: Taskforce Report on Mombasa County Healthcare System
